title: Which IIT is going to conduct the JEE Advanced 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey! Next year,i.e.(JEE MAINS and ADVANCED 2020),IIT BOMBAY will conduct IIT-JEE . The tentative dates are 24–27 May. There are 16 IIT’s in total as follows: BombayDelhiKanpurKharagpurMadrasGuwahatiRoorkeeHyderabadPatnaBhubaneshwarRoparJodhpurGandhinagarIndoreMandiVaranasiOut of these,only 7 IIT's conduct JEE MAINS and JEE ADVANCED exam. Those are: IIT BOMBAY, IIT DELHI, IIT MADRAS, IIT KANPUR, IIT KHARAGPUR, IIT GUWAHATI and IIT ROORKEE. This year,JEE was conducted by IIT ROORKEE .Last year,it was conducted by IIT Kanpur. Let’s hope it won’t be tough!! (like JEE ADVANCED 2019)

Hello Aspirant, IIT Delhi is likely to be the conducting institute of JEE Advanced 2020. To become eligible for appearing in the JEE Advanced 2020 at first you have to qualify JEE Main 2020 conducted by National Testing Agency (NTA). Since you are an Engineering Aspirant, I would like to inform you about Careers360 Talent search exam (CTSE) where students of 11th and 12th PCM/PCB can test their knowledge and enhance their preparation by knowing their stronger and weaker areas and win prizes and scholarships worth ₹1.25 Crore. It is a great opportunity for you. Take the test, perform the best, avail the scholarship and win prizes.You can win exciting prizes such as:₹50,000/- cash Prizes, Upto 100% Scholarship on JEE / NEET AI-Based preparation packages, Laptops, Smartphones, Amazon Echo, Careers360 Almanacs, Powerbanks, Upto ₹250/- paytm *Cashback offer. Good Luck!
